Module lanat
Package lanat.helpRepresentation

Class LayoutGenerators

java.lang.Object
lanat.helpRepresentation.LayoutGenerators
public final class LayoutGenerators extends Object
This contains methods that may be used in LayoutItems to generate the content of the help message.
See Also:
  • LayoutItem

  • Method Details

    • titleAndDescription

      @NotNull public static @NotNull String titleAndDescription(@NotNull @NotNull Command cmd)
      Shows the title of the command, followed by a description, if any.
      Parameters:
      cmd - The command to generate the title for.
      Returns:
      the generated title and description.

    • synopsis

      @Nullable public static @Nullable String synopsis(@NotNull @NotNull Command cmd)
      Shows the synopsis of the command, if any.

      The synopsis is a list of all Arguments, ArgumentGroups and Sub-Commands of the command. Each is shown with its own representation, as defined by the ArgumentRepr, ArgumentGroupRepr and CommandRepr classes.

      First elements shown are the arguments, ordered by Argument.sortByPriority(List), then the ArgumentGroups, which are shown recursively, and finally the sub-commands.

      Parameters:
      cmd - The command to generate the synopsis for.
      Returns:
      the generated synopsis.

    • heading

      @NotNull public static @NotNull String heading(@NotNull @NotNull String content, char lineChar)
      Parameters:
      content - Shows a heading with the given content, centered and surrounded by the given character.
      lineChar - The character to surround the content with.
      Returns:
      the generated heading.

    • heading

      @NotNull public static @NotNull String heading(@NotNull @NotNull String content)
      Shows a heading with the given content, centered and surrounded by dashes.
      Parameters:
      content - The content of the heading.
      Returns:
      the generated heading.

    • argumentDescriptions

      @Nullable public static @Nullable String argumentDescriptions(@NotNull @NotNull Command cmd)
      Shows the descriptions of the Arguments and ArgumentGroups of the command.

      The descriptions are shown in the same order as the synopsis. If groups are present, they are shown recursively too, with their own descriptions and with the correct indentation level.

      Parameters:
      cmd - The command to generate the descriptions for.
      Returns:
      the generated descriptions.

    • subCommandsDescriptions

      @Nullable public static @Nullable String subCommandsDescriptions(@NotNull @NotNull Command cmd)
      Shows the descriptions of the sub-commands of the command.
      Parameters:
      cmd - The command to generate the descriptions for.
      Returns:
      the generated descriptions.

    • programLicense

      @Nullable public static @Nullable String programLicense(@NotNull @NotNull Command cmd)
      Shows the license of the command, if any.

      Note that this is a program-only property, so it will only be shown if the command is an instance of ArgumentParser, that is, if it is the root command.

      Parameters:
      cmd - The command to generate the license for.
      Returns:
      the generated license.
      See Also:
      • ArgumentParser.setLicense(String)
